
```{r}
filter(gapminder,lifeExp<29)
filter(gapminder,country=="China")
filter(gapminder,country %in% c("Mexico","China"))
dat <- filter(gapminder,country=="Brazil",year >=1987 & year <=2007)
mean(dat$lifeExp)
```
